column4: When I use nvidia-glx-config and nvidia-xconfig for my nVIDIA Quadro NVS 140M, PC Card/ PCIe and I restart my computer, I get a black screen.
That is what I have installed at the moment.
I'm trying to get an xorg.conf that works.
what did you do that caused it?
ok.. had to be more than that, or did it never work?
can youu boot to a cli?
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
just take all defaults, don't worry about proper configuring, just try to get a bootable GUI.
is it working?
if its done, yes
did you just take the defaults on everything?
yes, see what it says the prob is.
usually defaults will get you to a GUI.
ok, so its a screen issue.
are you sure you saved when you used all the defaults?
wel, you can try that.
right... i don't tihnk its gonna work at this point.
and you've not gotten this system to work, correct?...
ok.
join me in /join #indygunfreak
did you have any luck?
its basically a CLI based IRC client
